title-group.article-title: Computation of the p-Part of the Ideal Class Group of Certain Real Abelian Fields

abstract.p: Under Greenberg's conjecture, we give an efficient method to compute the p-part of the ideal class group of certain real abelian fields by using cyclotomic units, Gauss sums and prime numbers. As numerical examples, we compute the p-part of the ideal class group of the maximal real subfield of $Q(\sqrt { - f,\zeta _{p^{n + 1} } } )$ in the range 1 < f < 200 and 5 < p < 100000. In order to explain our method, we show an example whose ideal class group is not cyclic.
